intension: Design an advertisement for a bike rental service that uses a woman on a scooter to showcase the style and convenience of their rentals. The advertisement includes the website jumont.net and phone numbers for booking.
globalcaption: The image features a woman wearing a green jacket and a red helmet, sitting on a red scooter. She is smiling and appears to be enjoying her time on the scooter. The scooter is positioned in the center of the image, with the woman sitting comfortably on it. The scene captures a moment of leisure and fun for the woman.
keywords: bike, scooter, woman, transport, transportation, lifestyle, city, ride, drive, female, urban, red, rent, rental, helmet, post, instagram, ig, insta

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a red background with a white line running horizontally across the top. The white line is positioned at the top left corner and extends across the entire width of the image. The red background is the main focus of the image, with no other objects or elements visible

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a woman wearing a green jacket and a red helmet, sitting on a red motor scooter. She is smiling and appears to be enjoying her ride. The scooter is positioned in the center of the image, with the woman sitting comfortably on it. The scene captures a moment of leisure and enjoyment for the woman as she rides her scooter
